Mansur Ismail nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Mansur Makeup, bụ onye Naijiria na-emepụta ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri site na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke mpaghara ugwu nke Naịjịrịa, nke a maara dị ka Kannywood.
A mụrụ Mansur na Kabalan Doki, Kaduna City na Jenụwarị 15, 1994
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị na Kaduna, ọ gụkwara nka na Mahadum Jos, Plateau State.
Mansur malitere oru ime ihe ntecha ya na 2007 n'ihi ndụmọdụ nke enyi ya, onye bụkwa onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, ka ọ sonye na ụlọ ọrụ Kannywood
Mansur wee tinye aka n'ime ihe ntecha ma rụọ ọrụ na ụfọdụ nnukwu ihe nkiri nke ụlọ ọrụ Kannywood.
